# w-textarea

## value

<w-textarea value="hello world"></w-textare>

```html
<w-textarea value="hello world"></w-textare>
```

## autoHeight

<w-textarea placeholder="autoHeight"></w-textare>

```html
<w-textarea placeholder="autoHeight"></w-textare>
```

## events

#### input

<w-textarea oninput="console.log(this.value)"></w-textarea>

```html
<w-textarea oninput="console.log(this.value)"></w-textarea>
```
